title: BRIEF-Bezant Resources Announces Proposed Disposal Of 80% Of Mankayan Project
text:
BRIEF-Bezant Resources Announces Proposed Disposal Of 80% Of Mankayan Project

Stock Markets 25 minutes ago (Oct 07, 2019 14:30)

BRIEF-Bezant Resources Announces Proposed Disposal Of 80% Of Mankayan Project Oct 7 (Reuters) - Bezant Resources PLC :

* BEZANT RESOURCES PLC - PROPOSED DISPOSAL OF 80% OF

MANKAYAN

PROJECT

* BEZANT RESOURCES ANNOUNCES PROPOSED DISPOSAL OF 80% OF

INTEREST

IN MANKAYAN COPPER-GOLD PROJECT TO MINING AND MINERALS

INDUSTRIES HOLDING

* BEZANT RESOURCES PLC - CONSIDERATION FOR SALE PAYABLE BY

MMIH

COMPRISES A FUNDING COMMITMENT OF UP TO US$2.25M



Source text for Eikon: ID:nRSG9068Oa

Further company coverage: BZT.L





BRIEF-Bezant Resources Announces Proposed Disposal Of 80% Of Mankayan Project
